channel.description:
> ## [color=blue]The Inquisitor[/color] > **[color=blue]Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]** **Holy Blessing (Passive) -** If the Neutral Killer dies before Night 3 , you will gain an extra use of Testimonial. **Find Magic (Night) -** Check if a player is a magic user. - Infinite Uses **Testimonial (Night) -** Determine if a player has killed another player.- 2 uses _Your objective is to Eliminate the Unseen, The Cult, and any Neutrals who stand against you_ **Magic Users:** Court Wizard Paladin Psychic (Priest) Illusionist Sage Sorceror Reaper Possesor (Minx)
> ## [color=purple] The Heretic[/color] > **[color=purple] Unseen Investigative [/color]** **Sinful Curse (Passive) -** If the Neutral Killer dies before Night 3 , gain an extra use of Ruthless Efficiency. **Find Magic (Night) -** Check if a player is a magic user. - Infinite Uses **Ruthless Efficiency (Night) -** Choose two players. If they are both magic , prevent them from visiting each other. - 1 use _Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you_
